messages.title: ONLY TONY MIKLINSKI WILL STAND FIRM AGAINST A SECOND REFERENDUM.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tony Miklinski promises to stand firm against a second referendum.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Many Unionists in North East Fife chose to vote tactically last time. But you get what you vote for, and the Lib Dems have teetered on the brink. Every single vote matters.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit brings risks and opportunities, the only way forward is to send strong, tactical people to the Brexit negotiations, and achieve what is best for Britain.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am delighted to be your Conservative candidate here in North East Fife.

contactInformation.address: Fife Conservatives, Haig House, Balgonie Road, Markinch, Fife KY7 6AA.

endorsements.endorser: Ruth Davidson MSP; Murdo Fraser MSP

images.caption: Tony with Mid Scotland and Fife MSP Murdo Fraser
